name: Hamstring Stretch
description: Static stretch targeting the hamstring muscles
instructions: Sit with legs extended
Reach forward slowly
Hold the stretch
tips: Don't bounce
Breathe deeply
Hold for 30 seconds

name: Shoulder Stretch
description: Static stretch for shoulder flexibility
instructions: Bring arm across chest
Hold with other arm
Feel stretch in shoulder
tips: Don't force the stretch
Hold for 30 seconds each arm

name: Hip Flexor Stretch
description: Static kneeling stretch for hip flexibility
instructions: Kneel on one knee
Place the other foot forward
Gently push hips forward
tips: Keep back straight
Don't let front knee go past toes
Hold for 30 seconds

name: Quadriceps Stretch
description: Standing quad stretch balance hold
instructions: Stand tall
Grab ankle behind
Gently pull heel toward glute
tips: Keep knees close
Avoid arching back
Use a wall for balance

name: Calf Stretch Wall
description: Wall assisted gastrocnemius stretch
instructions: Hands on wall
Back leg straight with heel down
Lean forward
tips: Keep back heel planted
Adjust distance from wall to change intensity

name: Thoracic Rotation
description: Dynamic spine rotation mobility
instructions: On all fours
Reach one arm under your body
Rotate and open chest toward the ceiling
tips: Move with control
Follow hand with your eyes

name: Pigeon Pose
description: Hip external rotation stretch
instructions: Front leg bent forward across body
Back leg extended straight
Fold torso gently over front leg
tips: Use a cushion under hip if needed
Relax into the pose
Keep hips square

name: Cat-Cow Stretch
description: Spinal flexion and extension mobility
instructions: On all fours
Inhale while arching the spine (Cow)
Exhale while rounding the spine (Cat)
tips: Move slowly and controlled
Coordinate with breath
Avoid any painful movements

name: Child's Pose
description: Restorative spine & hip stretch
instructions: Kneel and sit back on heels
Fold forward, extending arms
Relax forehead on the floor
tips: Breathe deeply into your back
Widen knees for more hip space

name: Cobra Stretch
description: Prone spinal extension pose
instructions: Lie prone
Place hands under shoulders
Press up, lifting chest and keeping hips on floor
tips: Keep elbows soft
Avoid pinching in the lower back
Open your chest

name: Band Shoulder Dislocates
description: Band assisted shoulder mobility arc
instructions: Grip band wide with both hands
Raise arms overhead, keeping elbows straight
Pass the band behind your back
tips: Move only in a pain-free range
Control the speed
Adjust grip width to change difficulty

name: Ankle Circles
description: Dynamic ankle joint mobility
instructions: Sit or stand, lift one foot
Draw circles with your ankle in both directions
Switch sides
tips: Make smooth, controlled motions
Start with small circles and gradually increase size

name: Neck Side Stretch
description: Gentle lateral neck stretch
instructions: Sit tall with good posture
Gently tilt ear towards shoulder
Hold the light stretch
tips: Do not apply pulling force
Breathe slowly and relax
Hold for 15-30 seconds per side

name: Triceps Stretch
description: Overhead stretch for the triceps muscle
instructions: Raise one arm overhead
Bend elbow, letting hand fall behind your neck
Use other hand to gently pull elbow
tips: Keep your chin off your chest
Feel the stretch in the back of your arm

name: Butterfly Stretch
description: Seated hip opener for inner thighs
instructions: Sit tall
Bring soles of your feet together
Gently press knees toward the floor
tips: Keep your spine straight
Pull heels closer to your body for a deeper stretch
Don't bounce

name: Seated Spinal Twist
description: Twisting stretch for spine and glutes
instructions: Sit with legs extended
Cross one leg over the other
Twist your torso toward the bent leg
tips: Sit tall and lengthen the spine before twisting
Use your arm for leverage
Breathe through the stretch

name: Standing Chest Stretch
description: Opens the chest and shoulder muscles
instructions: Stand in a doorway or interlace hands behind back
Squeeze shoulder blades together
Gently push chest forward
tips: Keep shoulders down and relaxed
Don't over-arch your back

name: Wrist Extensor Stretch
description: Stretches the muscles of the forearm
instructions: Extend one arm forward, palm down
Gently bend wrist down with other hand
Hold the stretch
tips: Keep your elbow straight
Repeat with palm facing up for flexor stretch

name: Runner's Lunge
description: Deep lunge to stretch hip flexors and hamstrings
instructions: Start in a high plank position
Step one foot forward between your hands
Lower your hips and feel the stretch
tips: Keep your back leg straight and engaged
You can drop the back knee for less intensity

name: Leg Swings (Forward)
description: Dynamic stretch for hamstrings and hip flexors
instructions: Stand sideways to a wall for support
Swing one leg forward and backward in a controlled arc
Switch legs
tips: Keep your torso upright
Focus on a smooth, rhythmic motion, not height

name: Leg Swings (Sideways)
description: Dynamic stretch for adductors and abductors
instructions: Face a wall for support
Swing one leg from side to side in front of your body
Switch legs
tips: Allow your hips to rotate slightly
Keep the movement controlled

name: Downward-Facing Dog
description: Full body stretch, common in yoga
instructions: Start on hands and knees
Lift your hips up and back, forming an inverted V shape
Press heels toward the floor
tips: Keep your head between your upper arms
You can pedal your feet to deepen the calf stretch

name: Lying Figure-Four Stretch
description: Supine stretch for glutes and piriformis
instructions: Lie on your back with knees bent
Cross one ankle over the opposite knee
Grasp the thigh of the bottom leg and pull gently toward you
tips: Keep your head and shoulders on the floor
Use a towel around your thigh if needed

name: Knee to Chest Stretch
description: Gentle stretch for the lower back and glutes
instructions: Lie on your back
Pull one knee in towards your chest
Hold it with both hands
tips: Keep the other leg extended or bent for comfort
Avoid lifting your tailbone off the floor

name: Arm Circles
description: Dynamic warm-up for the shoulder joint
instructions: Stand with arms extended to the sides
Make small circles with your arms
Gradually make the circles larger, then reverse direction
tips: Keep your core engaged
Start slow and controlled

name: Side Lunge Stretch
description: Stretches the inner thighs (adductors)
instructions: Stand with feet wide apart
Bend one knee and shift your weight to that side
Keep the other leg straight, feeling a stretch in the inner thigh
tips: Keep your bent knee behind your toes
Keep your chest up

name: Happy Baby Pose
description: Stretches inner groin and back spine
instructions: Lie on your back
Grab the outsides of your feet, opening knees wide
Gently pull your feet towards your armpits
tips: Keep your entire back on the floor
You can gently rock side to side to massage your spine

name: Frog Stretch
description: Intense hip and groin opener
instructions: Start on all fours
Widen your knees as far as comfortable
Keep ankles in line with knees and rest on your forearms
tips: Use a mat or padding under your knees
Breathe deeply and sink hips back gently
Go slowly and avoid pain

name: Upward-Facing Dog
description: Chest opener and spinal extension
instructions: Lie prone, hands under shoulders
Press up, straightening arms and lifting hips and thighs off the floor
Roll shoulders back and open chest
tips: Press through the tops of your feet
Keep your gaze forward or slightly up

name: Sphinx Pose
description: Gentle backbend and chest opener
instructions: Lie on your stomach
Place forearms on the floor with elbows under shoulders
Gently lift your chest and head
tips: Press your pubic bone into the floor to protect the lower back
Relax your glutes

name: Seated Forward Bend
description: Classic hamstring and lower back stretch
instructions: Sit with legs extended straight in front of you
Hinge at your hips and fold forward
Reach for your feet, ankles, or shins
tips: Keep your back as straight as possible
Bend your knees if your hamstrings are tight

name: Torso Twist (Dynamic)
description: Rotational warm-up for the core and spine
instructions: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart, knees slightly bent
Rotate your upper body from side to side
Allow your arms to swing freely
tips: Keep your hips relatively stable
Let your head follow the movement

name: Puppy Pose
description: Stretches the shoulders, chest, and upper back
instructions: Start on all fours
Walk your hands forward, keeping hips over knees
Lower your forehead or chin to the floor
tips: Feel the stretch in your shoulders and lats
Keep your arms active

name: Upper Trapezius Stretch
description: Targets the muscles on the side of the neck and top of the shoulders
instructions: Sit or stand tall
Gently tilt your head to one side
You can use your hand to apply gentle pressure
tips: Keep the opposite shoulder down
Don't pull forcefully

name: Side Bend Stretch
description: Stretches the obliques and lats
instructions: Stand with feet hip-width apart
Raise one arm overhead
Gently bend to the opposite side
tips: Keep your chest open
Avoid leaning forward or backward

name: Wall Angel
description: Improves shoulder mobility and posture
instructions: Stand with your back against a wall
Raise arms to a 'goalpost' position
Slide arms up and down the wall
tips: Keep your elbows, wrists, and back of your head against the wall
Move slowly

name: Deep Squat Hold
description: Improves hip, knee, and ankle mobility
instructions: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart
Lower into a deep squat, as low as you can
Keep heels on the ground and chest up
tips: Hold onto something for balance if needed
Use your elbows to gently press your knees out

name: Thread the Needle
description: Shoulder and upper back rotational stretch
instructions: Start on all fours
Slide one arm under your body, palm up
Lower your shoulder and head to the mat
tips: Press gently with the supporting hand to deepen the twist
Keep hips level

name: Camel Pose
description: Deep chest and hip flexor stretch, and backbend
instructions: Kneel with hips over knees
Place hands on your lower back
Arch back, reaching for your heels if accessible
tips: Keep your chest lifted
Support your lower back
Be cautious with your neck

name: Walking High Kicks
description: Dynamic stretch for the hamstrings
instructions: Walk forward
With each step, kick one leg straight up
Try to touch your toes with the opposite hand
tips: Keep your back straight
Focus on the stretch, not the height of the kick

name: Walking Quad Stretch
description: Dynamic stretch for the quadriceps
instructions: Take a step forward
Grab the ankle of your back leg
Pull heel to glute, hold for a moment, then step forward and switch
tips: Maintain balance
Keep knees close together during the stretch

name: Inchworm
description: Dynamic full-body stretch, especially for hamstrings and shoulders
instructions: From standing, hinge at hips to place hands on floor
Walk hands out to a plank position
Walk feet in towards hands
tips: Keep legs as straight as possible
Maintain a strong core in the plank

name: World's Greatest Stretch
description: Complex dynamic stretch for hips, hamstrings, and thoracic spine
instructions: Step into a deep lunge
Place both hands inside the front foot
Rotate and reach the inside arm to the ceiling
Return hand to floor and switch sides
tips: Sink your hips low
Follow your hand with your eyes during rotation

name: Supine Spinal Twist
description: Lying down twist for lower back and glutes
instructions: Lie on your back, bring one knee to your chest
Extend that arm out to the side
Gently guide your knee across your body with the opposite hand
tips: Try to keep both shoulder blades on the floor
Turn your head to look away from your knee

name: 90/90 Stretch
description: Targets hip internal and external rotation
instructions: Sit with front leg bent at 90 degrees in front
Back leg is bent at 90 degrees to the side
Keep torso upright and hinge forward over the front leg
tips: Try to keep both sit bones on the ground
Switch sides slowly

name: Doorway Stretch
description: Excellent chest and shoulder opener
instructions: Stand in a doorway
Place forearms on the frame with elbows bent at 90 degrees
Gently step or lean forward
tips: Adjust arm height to target different parts of the chest
Don't force the stretch

name: Scorpion Stretch
description: Dynamic stretch for hip flexors and lower back
instructions: Lie face down with arms out to the sides
Lift one leg and bend the knee
Reach the lifted foot across your body towards the opposite hand
tips: Keep your chest and shoulders close to the floor
Move with control

name: Lizard Pose
description: Deep hip flexor and hamstring stretch
instructions: From a lunge, place both hands inside the front foot
Heel-toe the front foot outwards
Stay on hands or lower to forearms for a deeper stretch
tips: Keep the back knee on or off the ground
Don't let the front knee splay out too much

name: Half Kneeling Adductor Stretch
description: Targets the inner thigh muscles of the straight leg
instructions: Start in a half-kneeling position
Extend the non-kneeling leg out to the side
Gently rock your hips back to feel the stretch
tips: Keep the extended foot flat on the floor
Maintain a neutral spine

name: Foam Roller Thoracic Extension
description: Improves upper back mobility using a foam roller
instructions: Lie with a foam roller across your upper back
Support your head with your hands
Gently extend your spine over the roller
tips: Do not roll onto your neck or lower back
Breathe and relax into the extension

name: Rag Doll Pose
description: Passive forward fold to release the spine and hamstrings
instructions: From standing, hinge at the hips
Let your head and arms hang heavy
Grasp opposite elbows and gently sway
tips: Keep a generous bend in your knees
Release all tension in your neck

name: Cradle Walk
description: Dynamic stretch for hip external rotators and glutes
instructions: While walking, lift one knee
Grasp the knee and ankle, pulling the shin parallel to the ground
Hold for a moment, release, step, and switch
tips: Stand tall
Pull the leg up and across the body

name: Seated Straddle Stretch
description: Stretches hamstrings, groin, and inner thighs
instructions: Sit on the floor with legs in a wide 'V'
Keeping back straight, hinge at the hips and walk hands forward
Fold forward as far as comfortable
tips: Keep your toes and kneecaps pointed toward the ceiling
Sit on a cushion to help tilt your pelvis forward

name: Shoulder CARs (Controlled Articular Rotations)
description: Active mobility drill for the shoulder joint
instructions: Stand tall, core tight
Slowly rotate one arm through its full range of motion without compensating elsewhere
Reverse the circle
tips: Keep the movement extremely slow and controlled
Avoid shrugging the shoulder or arching the back

name: Hip CARs (Controlled Articular Rotations)
description: Active mobility drill for the hip joint
instructions: On all fours or standing, brace your core
Slowly make the largest possible circle with your knee
Reverse the circle
tips: Isolate the movement to the hip joint
Avoid any movement in the lower back

name: Prayer Stretch
description: Stretches the lats and triceps
instructions: Kneel in front of a bench or chair
Place elbows on the surface, hands together
Drop your head and chest toward the floor
tips: Bring hands together behind your head for a deeper stretch
Breathe and sink into the stretch

name: Triangle Pose
description: Yoga pose for side body, hamstrings, and groin
instructions: Stand with feet wide, front foot forward, back foot parallel
Hinge at the front hip, reaching down to ankle or floor
Extend the top arm to the ceiling
tips: Keep both legs straight
Stack your shoulders and hips

name: Bound Angle Pose
description: Another name for the Butterfly Stretch, common in yoga
instructions: Sit tall with soles of feet together
Hold onto feet and gently fold forward
Use elbows to press knees down
tips: Lead with your chest, keeping the spine long
Don't force your knees to the ground

name: Cow Face Pose Arms
description: Intense shoulder stretch, targeting internal and external rotation
instructions: Reach one arm up and behind your back
Reach the other arm down and up your back
Try to clasp hands between your shoulder blades
tips: Use a strap or towel if you can't reach
Sit tall and don't jut your head forward

name: Half Split Pose
description: A preparatory stretch for the full splits, targets hamstrings
instructions: From a low lunge, shift hips back and straighten front leg
Flex the front foot
Fold over the straight leg
tips: Keep your hips square to the front
Use blocks under your hands for support

name: Wrist Circles
description: Dynamic mobility for the wrist joints
instructions: Clasp hands together
Roll your wrists in a circular motion
Reverse direction
tips: Move slowly and smoothly
Explore the full range of motion

name: Neck Retraction (Chin Tucks)
description: Postural exercise to stretch suboccipital muscles and strengthen deep neck flexors
instructions: Sit or stand tall
Gently glide your chin and head straight back
Hold for a moment and release
tips: Imagine making a double chin
Keep your gaze level

name: Ankle Dorsiflexion Stretch
description: Targets ankle mobility, specifically dorsiflexion
instructions: In a half-kneeling position near a wall
Drive your front knee forward over your toes
Feel the stretch in your ankle and calf
tips: Keep your front heel on the ground
Don't let your arch collapse

name: Glute Bridge
description: Activates glutes and provides a gentle stretch for hip flexors
instructions: Lie on your back, knees bent, feet flat
Lift your hips toward the ceiling
Squeeze glutes at the top, then lower slowly
tips: Avoid over-arching your lower back
Drive through your heels

name: Eagle Pose Arms
description: Stretches the upper back and shoulders
instructions: Extend arms forward
Cross one elbow over the other
Bend elbows and bring palms to touch
tips: Lift your elbows and press forearms away from your face
Drop your shoulders away from your ears

name: Hamstring Curls (Standing)
description: Dynamic activation for the hamstrings
instructions: Stand and hold onto something for balance
Bend one knee and bring your heel toward your glute
Lower with control and switch sides
tips: Move in a controlled manner
Keep your hips stationary

name: Open Book Stretch
description: Improves thoracic spine rotation and opens the chest
instructions: Lie on your side with knees bent, arms straight out
Lift the top arm and rotate it across your body to the other side
Follow your hand with your gaze
tips: Try to keep your knees together
Exhale as you open

name: Reclining Hand-to-Big-Toe Pose
description: Supine hamstring stretch
instructions: Lie on your back
Loop a strap around the ball of one foot
Extend the leg towards the ceiling, keeping it straight
tips: Keep your lower back and head on the floor
The other leg can be bent or straight

name: Foam Roller Quads
description: Self-myofascial release for the quadriceps
instructions: Lie face down with a foam roller under your thighs
Use your arms to slowly roll up and down from your hips to just above your knees
Pause on any tender spots
tips: Keep your core engaged to protect your back
You can rotate your body to target different parts of the muscle

name: Foam Roller Hamstrings
description: Self-myofascial release for the hamstrings
instructions: Sit with the foam roller under your thighs
Use your hands to support your weight and lift your hips
Slowly roll from below the hip to the back of the knee
tips: Cross one leg over the other to increase pressure
Rotate your leg to target different areas

name: Foam Roller Calves
description: Self-myofascial release for the calf muscles
instructions: Sit with foam roller under one calf
Support yourself with your hands
Slowly roll from the ankle to below the knee
tips: Point and flex your foot to work the muscle differently
Cross your other leg over to add pressure

name: Foam Roller Glutes
description: Self-myofascial release for the glutes and piriformis
instructions: Sit on the foam roller with one buttock
Cross the ankle of that side over the opposite knee
Lean into the hip of the crossed leg and roll gently
tips: Control the pressure with your hands and supporting foot
Pause on tight spots

name: Foam Roller Lats
description: Self-myofascial release for the latissimus dorsi
instructions: Lie on your side with the foam roller under your armpit area
Use your feet and core to control movement
Slowly roll down the side of your torso
tips: Do not roll directly over the ribs
Lean back slightly to better target the lat muscle

name: Psoas Stretch
description: Targets the deep hip flexor (psoas) muscle
instructions: In a low lunge with back knee down
Tuck your tailbone (posterior pelvic tilt)
Gently press hips forward without arching your back
tips: Squeezing the glute of the back leg increases the stretch
Reach the same-side arm up for a deeper stretch

name: Standing IT Band Stretch
description: Stretches the iliotibial band on the outside of the thigh
instructions: Stand near a wall for support
Cross the leg to be stretched behind the other leg
Lean your hip towards the wall
tips: You should feel the stretch on the outside of your hip
Reach the arm of the stretched leg overhead

name: Piriformis Stretch
description: Targets the deep gluteal muscle, the piriformis
instructions: Lie on your back and perform a figure-four stretch
Gently pull the knee of the crossed leg toward the opposite shoulder
This subtle change targets the piriformis more directly
tips: Find the angle that gives you the best stretch
Don't force it

name: Shoulder Rolls
description: Simple dynamic movement to relieve shoulder and neck tension
instructions: Sit or stand tall
Slowly roll your shoulders up, back, and down
Reverse the direction
tips: Coordinate with your breath
Make the movement smooth and deliberate

name: Wall Calf Stretch (Bent Knee)
description: Targets the deeper calf muscle (soleus)
instructions: Stand facing a wall
Place the foot to be stretched behind you
Bend both knees, keeping the back heel on the floor
tips: You should feel this stretch lower in the calf than the straight-leg version
Lean into the wall for support

name: Toe Touch Walk
description: Dynamic hamstring stretch while moving
instructions: Take a small step forward with your heel
Keeping that leg straight, hinge at the hips and reach for your toes
Stand up, step through, and repeat on the other side
tips: Keep your back flat
Don't worry if you can't touch your toes

name: Cat-Cow with Thoracic Rotation
description: Combines spinal mobility with rotation
instructions: From all fours, perform a Cat-Cow
Then, lift one hand and rotate your chest open to that side
Return to center and repeat on the other side
tips: Integrate the movements smoothly
Exhale on rotation

name: Side-Lying Quad Stretch
description: Gentle quadriceps stretch without needing to balance
instructions: Lie on your side
Grab the ankle of your top leg
Gently pull your heel towards your glute
tips: Keep your knees in line with each other
Don't arch your back

name: Iron Cross Stretch
description: Dynamic stretch for lower back, glutes, and hips
instructions: Lie on your back with arms out to the sides
Keeping legs straight, swing one leg up and across your body
Try to touch your foot to the opposite hand
tips: Keep both shoulders on the ground as much as possible
Move with control

name: Melting Heart Pose
description: Another name for Puppy Pose, emphasizes shoulder and chest opening
instructions: From all fours, walk hands forward while keeping hips over knees
Allow your chest to 'melt' towards the floor
Rest forehead or chin on the mat
tips: Keep arms active and straight
Breathe into the space between your shoulder blades

name: Bridge Pose
description: Yoga pose that opens the chest and stretches the neck and spine
instructions: Lie on back, knees bent, feet flat on the floor
Press into feet and lift hips off the floor
Clasp hands together under your back if possible
tips: Keep your thighs parallel
Press your sternum towards your chin

name: Half Lord of the Fishes Pose
description: Seated spinal twist to energize the spine
instructions: Sit with one leg extended, the other foot placed outside the straight leg
Twist toward the bent knee
Hook the opposite elbow outside the bent knee
tips: Lengthen your spine on the inhale, twist on the exhale
Keep both sit bones grounded

name: Pectoral Wall Stretch
description: Targets the pectoral muscles using a wall corner or doorway
instructions: Stand in a corner, place one forearm on each wall
Gently lean your body forward
Feel the stretch across your chest
tips: Experiment with different arm heights
Step into the stretch slowly

name: Squat to Stand
description: Dynamic movement improving hip mobility and hamstring flexibility
instructions: Start in a deep squat, holding onto your toes
Keeping hold of your toes, lift your hips to straighten your legs
Lower back into the squat
tips: Keep your back as flat as possible when extending
It's okay if you can't fully straighten your legs

name: Leg Cradle
description: Static version of the cradle walk, targeting hip rotators
instructions: Sitting or standing, lift one leg
Hold the knee and ankle, cradling the lower leg
Gently pull the leg up and across your body
tips: Sit tall with a straight spine
Flex the foot of the cradled leg to protect the knee

name: Head to Knee Pose
description: Seated forward bend targeting one leg at a time
instructions: Sit with one leg extended, the other foot to your inner thigh
Twist torso toward the extended leg
Fold forward over the straight leg
tips: Use a strap around your foot if needed
Keep the spine long

name: Gate Pose
description: Kneeling side bend to stretch the side body and inner thigh
instructions: Kneel, then extend one leg out to the side
Raise the opposite arm and bend towards the extended leg
Rest the bottom hand on the straight leg
tips: Keep your hips pressed forward
Rotate your chest open toward the ceiling

name: Extended Side Angle Pose
description: Deep side body stretch combined with a lunge
instructions: From a warrior II stance, bend your front elbow to your thigh
Extend the top arm overhead, creating a long line from foot to fingertips
Rotate chest open
tips: Press firmly into the outer edge of your back foot
Keep the side body long

name: Low Lunge with Twist
description: Combines a hip flexor stretch with thoracic rotation
instructions: In a low lunge, place opposite hand to front foot on the floor
Rotate and reach the other arm towards the ceiling
Keep hips sinking forward
tips: Engage the glute of the back leg
Follow the top hand with your gaze

name: Warrior I Pose
description: Strengthens legs and stretches hip flexors and chest
instructions: Step one foot back, back foot at a 45-degree angle
Bend front knee over ankle
Square hips forward and raise arms overhead
tips: Press into the outer edge of the back foot
Relax shoulders away from ears

name: Warrior II Pose
description: Opens the hips and chest, strengthens legs
instructions: Stand with feet wide, front foot forward, back foot parallel
Bend front knee over ankle
Open hips and torso to the side, extending arms parallel to floor
tips: Keep front knee tracking over the second toe
Gaze is over the front fingertips

name: Reverse Warrior Pose
description: Side body stretch that opens the chest
instructions: From Warrior II, slide back hand down back leg
Raise front arm up and arch back gently
Keep the front knee bent
tips: Create space in the side body
Gaze can be up towards the top hand or forward

name: Fish Pose
description: Chest opener and throat stretch, counter-pose to shoulder stands
instructions: Lie on your back, place hands under your hips
Press into your elbows and forearms to lift your chest
Gently release the crown of your head to the floor
tips: Keep the weight in your forearms, not your head
Breathe into your chest

name: Legs Up the Wall Pose
description: Restorative pose to relieve tired legs and gently stretch hamstrings
instructions: Sit sideways against a wall
Swing your legs up the wall as you lie down on your back
Scoot your hips as close to the wall as is comfortable
tips: Use a cushion under your hips for support
Let your arms rest by your sides

name: Wide-Legged Forward Bend
description: Stretches hamstrings, calves, hips, and lower back
instructions: Stand with feet wide apart, parallel
Hinge at the hips and fold forward
Place hands on the floor or ankles
tips: Keep a microbend in the knees
Let your head hang heavy

name: Garland Pose (Malasana)
description: Yogic deep squat for hips, groin, and lower back
instructions: Stand with feet slightly wider than hips, toes out
Squat down as low as possible
Bring hands to prayer at chest, using elbows to press knees out
tips: If heels don't reach the floor, place a rolled towel under them
Keep your spine long

name: Plow Pose
description: Advanced yoga inversion that stretches the shoulders and spine
instructions: From a shoulder stand, or lying down, lift legs overhead
Lower your toes to the floor behind your head
Keep legs straight
tips: Do not turn your head in this pose
Support your back with your hands
Exit the pose slowly and carefully

name: Saddle Pose
description: Intense stretch for quadriceps and ankles, a yin yoga pose
instructions: Sit between your heels
Slowly recline back, first onto your hands, then elbows, then possibly all the way down
Do not force
tips: Use bolsters or cushions to support your back
If painful for the knees, avoid or modify

name: Toe Squat
description: Intense stretch for the plantar fascia and toes
instructions: Kneel on the floor
Tuck your toes under
Slowly sit your hips back onto your heels
tips: Start with short durations
Lean forward to reduce intensity

name: Humble Warrior
description: A forward bend from Warrior I, stretching hips and shoulders
instructions: From Warrior I, interlace hands behind your back
Hinge at the hips and fold forward inside your front leg
Let your head hang heavy and lift your clasped hands
tips: Keep the front knee bent deeply
Press firmly through the back foot
